snippet: People who wanted a ticket reduced or dismissed paid for the favor with goods and services, prosecutors say.
abstract: Federal prosecutors file fraud charges against nine sitting and former Philadelphia Traffic Court judges accused of dismissing or reducing traffic citations for political, business and social associates in return for favors like free car repairs and shipments of seafood.
lead_paragraph: People who wanted a ticket reduced or dismissed paid for the favor with goods and services, prosecutors say.

headline.main: Philadelphia Judges Indicted in Ticket Case
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Judges Indicted in Ticket Case
